He uses what he makes from his business to pay the household expenses. Santos is asking for a loan to buy coconuts wholesale to continue with his business and with this he hopes to offer his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy coconuts wholesale.

loans.name: Alicia

texts.en:
Alicia is 63 years old and married with five children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Alicia is borrowing PHP 30,000 through NWTF in order to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Alicia has been raising pigs for 10 years and also earns additional income from a general store.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream, which is to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs .

loans.name: Jorge Rodimiro

texts.es: Jorge, de 39 años de edad, esta casado, tiene 3 hijos quienes están estudiando y reside en la aldea de Nueva Esperanza en el municipio de Santa Cruz de Yojoa junto a su esposa e hijos.  Su esposa también es agricultora. Jorge siempre se ha dedicado a la caficultura, cultiva café. lleva mas de 9 años de dedicarse a la elaboración de viveros de café y a vender las plantas. La especialidad es en producir café en pergamino húmedo y venta de viveros. El ha solicitado un tercer ciclo de préstamo en ODEF que es por 6,000 lempiras para comprar fertilizantes y poderle dar buena asistencia al vivero para obtener mejor ganancia. Su plan es ampliar la producción de viveros y poder mejorar la condición de vida a su familia.
texts.en: Jorge is 39 years old. He is married and has 3 children who are in school and who live in the town of Nueva Esperanza in the municipality of Santa Cruz de Yojoa with his wife and children. His wife is also a farmer Jorge has always worked growing coffee. For more than 9 years, he has worked growing coffee  seedlings and selling the plants. His specialty is producing wet parchment coffee and selling seedlings. He has asked for a third cycle loan from ODEF for 6,000 lempiras to buy fertilizer and be able to help his seedlings to obtain more profits. His plan is to expand production of seedlings and be able to improve his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for his coffee nursery.

loans.name: Telma  Noemy

texts.es: Doña Telma de 44 años de edad vive en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus cuatro  hijos, ella se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos desde hace varios años, es una persona muy responsable y trabajadora, además muy reconocida en la zona por su excelente labor, de esta manera ha logrado solventar algunos de sus gastos familiares, Doña Telma solicita un crédito para la compra de insumos para sus cultivos como: abonos, semillas, fertilizantes, etc. para poder mejorar sus ingresos y ofrecerle a su familia un futuro digno.
texts.en: Telma is 44 years old. She lives in her own home with her life's companion and their four children. She has grown basic grains for several years. She is a very responsible and hardworking person. She is also known in the area  persona for her excellent work. This is how she has been able to pay for some family expenses. Telma is asking for a loan to buy materials for her crops, such as fertilizer, seeds, etc.i order to improve her income and offer her family a worthy future.

loans.use: to buy materials for her crops, such as: fertilizer, seeds, etc.

loans.name: Toribio

texts.es: Don Toribio de 36 años de edad, vive en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus cuatro hijos, el se dedica a realizar viajes por las diferentes colonias, desde hace varios años, es una persona muy responsable y puntual  además sus servicios son muy demandados en la zona, por esta razón ya tiene una clientela establecida, que siempre los buscan por la amabilidad con que los atiende, de esta manera ha logrado sacar su familia adelante y solventar algunos de sus gastos familiares, don Toribio solicita un crédito para comprar repuestos para el pick up en que realiza los viajes, y así poder incrementar sus ingresos y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Toribio, 36, lives in a house of his own together with his life partner and four children. He has been working for some years in transportation, travelling through different communities. He is a responsible and punctual person and his services are highly demanded by locals; this is why he has a good client base. His clients prefer him for his kindness. With this activity, he has been able to get ahead with his family and cover some of the home expenses.

Toribio is requesting a loan to buy spare parts for the pickup he uses for his job. This way, his income will increase and his quality of life will improve.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for his vehicle.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El cliente es una persona honrada y trabajadora, vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida y su hija, desde hace varios años se dedica al cultivo de de granos básicos principalmente a la siembra de maíz, frijol y maicillo, comercializa en los alrededores de la zona donde el vive, con lo que obtiene de su negocio logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el cliente esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de insumos agrícolas semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. con esto espera obtener mejores ganancias y brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Our client is an honest, hardworking person who lives with his wife and daughter in their own home. For several years he has earned his living growing basic grains, mainly corn, beans, and sorghum. He sells them in the local neighbourhoods. With the money he earns from his business he manages to pay for household expenses.

He is seeking a loan to buy farming supplies such as seeds, fertilizer, manure, insecticide etc. From these purchases he hopes to earn more money so he can provide his family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: buy farming supplies such as seeds, fertilizer, manure, insecticide

loans.name: Rosa Lilian

texts.es: Doña Rosa de 55 años de edad, vive en casa de un familiar junto a su esposo, ella posee una tienda desde hace varios años, es una persona honrada y trabajadora, además muy amable y atenta con sus clientes, tiene muy buena moral de pago, gracias a su trabajo ha logrado sacar a su familia adelante y solventar algunos de sus gastos familiares, Doña Rosa solicita un crédito para la compra de mas mercadería para surtir su tienda como golosinas, granos básicos, aceite, sopas, galletas, etc. para poder mejorar sus ventas y ofrecerle a su familia un futuro estable.
texts.en:
Rosa is 55 years old, and lives with her husband in her family home. She has had a general store for several years. She is an honest and hard-working person, as well as very friendly and attentive to her clients, and she is conscientious in financial matters. Thanks to her hard work she has managed to take her family forward and settle some of her family expenses. 

Rosa is seeking a loan in order to buy more goods to stock her store, such as snacks, basic grains, oil, soups, cookies, etc. This will enable her to improve her sales and provide a stable future for her family.

loans.use: to buy snacks, basic grains, oil, soups, cookies, etc.

loans.name: La Inmaculada Concepcion Group

texts.es: El grupo “Inmaculada Concepción”  está conformada por  06 mujeres trabajadoras y responsables que buscan mejorar cada día. Nuestra socia  Gladys comenzó trabajando en manualidades, con el buen uso que le dio a sus ingresos tiempo después pudo emprender su propio negocio, donde actualmente cuenta con una bodega en su vivienda. Se siente feliz pues este negocio le ha permitido mejorar su vivienda. Más adelante piensa implementar su negocio. Solicitó el crédito para la compra de abarrotes, golosinas y bebidas. Gladys de 60 años es casada y tiene 05 hijos independientes. Gladys junto al grupo “Inmaculada Concepción” agradecen a las personas que hicieron posible éste crédito. Gladys se encuentra de pie en la parte posterior, es la primera del lado derecho y viste cafarena marón y chaleco.
texts.en: The “Inmaculada Concepción” [Immaculate Conception] group is comprised of six hardworking, responsible women looking to improve every day.  Our member, Gladys, began working in craftwork.  Afterwards, by putting her income to good use, she was able to start her own business, a grocery store located in her home.  She feels happy because this business has allowed her to make home improvements.  Later, she plans to stock her business.  She is requesting the loan to purchase groceries, candy, and beverages.  Gladys is 60 years old and married with five adult children.  She and the “Inmaculada Concepción” group are grateful to the people that make this loan possible.  In the photo, she is standing first on the right and she is wearing a maroon shirt and a vest.

loans.use: to purchase groceries, candy, and beverages.

loans.name: Shalom - Faucett - San Juan Masias - Callao Group

texts.es: Zoila es socia del grupo “Shalom - Faucett - San Juan Masias - Callao”  ella es casada y tiene 03 hijos. Zoila tiene una bodega en su casa, donde vende diversos productos en su mayoría bebidas, su esposo es taxista y ambos trabajan con el único fin de darles a sus hijos una buena educación. Zoila ha solicitado este préstamo para invertir en su negocio con la compra de productos como fideos, menestras y bebidas. Su mayor anhelo en la vida es ampliar su bodega para la comodidad de sus clientes quienes diariamente acuden a su negocio para comprarle. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas de KIVA por este préstamo. Zoila es la ultima de la derecha viste saco color plomo.
texts.en:
Zoila's a member of  the "Shalom - Faucett - San Juan Masias - Callao” Group. She's married and has three children.

Zoila has a store in her house where she sells a variety of products, mostly beverages.  Her husband's a taxi driver and both of them work only to give their children a good education.

Zoila has requested this loan to invest in her business by buying products such as pasta, soup, and beverages.

Her greatest desire in life is to expand her store for the comfort of her customers, who shop in her business every day.

The group thanks the Kiva investors for this loan.  Zoila's the last one on the right; she's wearing a gray jacket.

loans.use: to buy noodles, soups, beverages, and other products

loans.name: Nuevo Horizonte Group

texts.es: George  de 21  Años de edad soltero y con 1  hijo, George se dedica hace  2  años al servicio de costura remalle George  confecciona prendas de vestir, mochilas,  en un pequeño local (alquilado) con el fin de progresar día a día y salir adelante, George  ha sabido ganarse a los clientes  y así poder mejorar su calidad de vida. George  solicito el préstamo para comprar  (telas) la vez  George   y todos los integrantes se encuentran  agradecidos  con Kiva  por el préstamo otorgado  y por la confianza que se  les ha sido brindada. George  está parado es el único caballero,  Se despide  Dejando la promesa  que cumplirá todas sus metas propuestas.
texts.en:
George is 21 years old, single and has one child.  For the past two years he has worked as a clothing mender. He sews clothing and backpacks in a small rented store, and he hopes to make progress day by day and get ahead. George has learned how to win customers and thereby improve his quality of life. He has requested the loan to buy fabric.

Both George and all the members of the group are grateful to Kiva for the loan and for the faith that has been shown in them. In the photo, George is standing and is the only male. He sends regards and promises that he will meet all of his proposed goals.

loans.use: to buy fabric.

loans.name: Iván Darío

texts.es: Iván,  a sus 55 años de edad es padre de dos hijos y vive en unión libre con su compañera sentimental. Desde hace 15 años salió de su pueblo y se radicó en la ciudad, en busca de mejores oportunidades para sacar adelante a su familia. Comenzó a trabajar como empleado en un taller de soldadura donde aprendió todo lo relacionado con la cerrajería y así obtuvo los ingresos suficientes para llevar el sustento a su hogar y sacar adelante a sus hijos. Con el ideal de mejorar los ingresos y tener más oportunidades de seguir progresando, decidió independizarse, por lo que montó su propio negocio de cerrajería hace aproximadamente un año, donde labora desde las 8:00 am. El cliente es un señor trabajador, perseverante y humilde, apasionado por su labor. Esto lo motiva a solicitar el crédito que invertirá en la compra de maquinaria y materia prima al por mayor, con lo que podrá agilizar su producción y así aumentar sus ventas, esto se verá reflejado en el incremento de los recursos económicos que recibe y así podrá seguir satisfaciendo las necesidades básicas de su hogar, además tendrá la oportunidad de avanzar hacia el cumplimiento de su principal sueño que es tener un local más amplio, donde pueda generar empleo y así hacer de su negocio un fuente de ingresos más rentable y sostenible en el tiempo, lo que a mediano plazo se verá representado en mejores condiciones de vida y bienestar para él y su núcleo familiar.
texts.en:
Iván, at 55 years of age, is the father of two children and lives in a common-law marriage with his partner. Fifteen years ago he left his hometown and settled in the city of Medellín, in search of better opportunities to do well for his family. He started working as an employee in a welding workshop, where he learned all about locksmithing, and earned enough to sustain his household and provide for his children. With the idea of improving his income and creating more opportunities to continue to progress, he decided to go independent. He therefore set up his own locksmith's business about a year ago, where he works all day from 8 a.m.

He is a hard-working, determined, and humble man, passionate about his work. This has motivated him to seek this loan, which he will invest in buying to buy machinery and raw materials in bulk. This will enable him to speed up his production, and so increase his sales, which will be reflected in increased income. This way he will be able to continue meeting his basic household needs, and in addition he will have the opportunity to make progress towards realising his greatest dream. This is to have a larger premises, where he could create jobs and make his business a more profitable and sustainable source of income. In the medium term this will mean improved living conditions and well-being for him and immediate family.

loans.use: to buy machinery and raw materials in bulk.

loans.name: Rita

texts.es: Rita, de 40 años de edad, está casada con José y vive en compañía de sus hijos  de 20 y 04  años de edad en su casa propia. Rita se dedica ala venta de periódicos para eso se levanta muy de temprano en la madrugada y se dirige a  la imprenta donde compra sus periódicos para luego llevarlos a su puesto en un mercado conocido de la ciudad, pero además sale a vender de manera ambulatoria caminando por las calles de la ciudad, lleva realizando éste oficio desde hace 15 años logrando hacerse conocida y contando con una buena clientela quienes la esperan por su periódico diario. Le gusta su negocio pues con ese dinero a sacado adelante a su hijo pero ahora viendo su avanzada edad y sabiendo que en un futuro ya no podrá salir a caminar  por las calles, tiene planeado hacer arreglos en su casa y construir cuartos para alquilar. Este es su segundo préstamo con Kiva, por tanto espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. Con el monto solicitado de S/.1500 nuevos soles los invertirá en la compra de periódico y un saldo en la compra de maderas para el arreglo su casa y la construcción de cuartos pequeños para alquiler.
texts.en: Rita is 40 years old and married to José.  They live in their own home with their two children, aged 20 years and 4 years old respectively.  Rita makes a living selling newspapers and so gets up very early in the morning and heads to the printing plant to buy the newspapers.  She then heads down to a well-known market stall in the city, though she also sells as she walks along the streets of the city.  Rita has been doing this work for 15 years and she has become well-known and acquired a number of customers who wait to buy their daily paper from her.  Rita likes her business as, with this money, she has helped her son to get ahead.  However, now, knowing that she is a little older and will not be able to go out to walk the streets, she is planning to do some work in her house and build rooms that she can rent out.  This is Rita's second loan with Kiva and she is hoping for your help in order to continue with her objectives.  She promises to make her repayments on time.  With the 1500 Nuevo Soles loan that she has applied for, Rita will invest in buying newspapers and buying wood for the work in her house and building small rooms to rent out.

loans.use: to buy newspapers, and wood for making rooms to rent out.

loans.name: Santa Ana Group

texts.es: Un grupo conformado por 6 personas emprendedoras  y con mucha creatividad para los negocios. Así son los integrantes del grupo comunal “SANTA ANA”.  La Sra. Amanda de 56 años de edad  y madre de  7  hijos,  ella se dedica hace 3 años  a la venta de verduras (tubérculos)  en un pequeño mercado.  La Sra. Amanda  nos cuenta que ha llegado a fidelizar  a sus clientes   el cual le ha generado ganancias para poder cubrir los gastos de su hogar,  En el futuro le gustaría tener un local propio donde poder vender sus  verduras   y así  obtener mayores ganancias económicas. Con el préstamo otorgado lo invertirá   en compras más  productos  (zapallo, zanahoria, rabanito, papas etc. ) y  así poder salir adelante. A la vez  la Sra. Amanda  y todos los integrantes se encuentran  agradecidos con Kiva y Edaprospo por el préstamo otorgado  y por la confianza que se  les ha sido brindada. La Sra. Amanda  se le distingue por su casaca negra es la primera señora de la mano izquierda,  se despide  Dejando la promesa  que cumplirá todas sus metas propuestas.
texts.en: This is the "Santa Ana" group, made up of six enterprising people who are very creative when it comes to business.  Amanda is 56 years old and a mother to seven children.  For three years she has been making a living selling vegetables (potatoes) in a small market.  She tells us that her customers are loyal, thus she earns a profit to cover household costs.  In the future Amanda would like to have her own premises where she can sell her vegetables and so earn higher profits.  With this loan, Amanda will invest in buying more products (pumpkin, carrots, radish, potatoes, and more) and then will be able to prosper.  Amanda and all the other members of the group are grateful to Kiva and Edaprospo for this loan and for the trust that they are being given.  In the photo, Amanda is the first on the left, wearing a black jacket.  Amanda promises that she achieve all her proposed targets.

loans.use: to buy vegetables.

loans.name: Deysi Osmari

texts.es:
Doña Doris es una mujer de 30 años de edad casada y madre de 3 hijos con un grado de educación primaria completa. Ella es agricultora hace muchos años ya que su familia por tradición practica dicha actividad pasando sus conocimiento de generación en generación y junto a su esposo se dedican al cultivo y siembra de café mismo que es comercializado en los alrededores de la zona donde ella habita con los diferentes compradores, intermediarios y en el mercado local. Ella aprendió dicha actividad en compañía de sus padres y hoy en día lo elabora en compaña de su pareja siendo los únicos 2 involucrados en todas las actividades que realizan en el campo ya que sus hijos son menores de edad y están muy pequeños.

Actualmente ella solicita un financiamiento para la compra de 10 QQ de fertilizante, 13 QQ de formula cafetalera y 12 QQ de urea y 10 QQ de nutricafe para dar mantenimiento y asistencia a sus cultivos de café ya que con ello espera que su cosecha mejore y de excelentes resultados.

Sus metas para el futuro son ampliar sus tierras, sembrar una variedad de granos que ayuden al crecimiento de su negocio, a mejorar los ingresos para su familia y sobre todo a generar ingresos para darles a sus hijos una buena educación, y enviarlos a la universidad.
texts.en:
Doris is 30 years old, married, and a mother to three children.  She completed primary school and has now been a farmer for many years.  Traditionally her family has always worked in farming, passing their knowledge through the generations.  Alongside her husband, Doris makes a living growing coffee which she sells in the area surrounding where she lives.  Different buyers and intermediaries come to the local market to buy the coffee.  Doris learned this trade from her parents and she now does the work with her husband.  They are the only ones involved in doing this work in the field as their children are still very young.

Doris is currently applying for a loan in order to buy 1000 lbs of fertliser, 1300 lbs of products for growing coffee, 1200 lbs of urea, and 1000 lbs of nutrients for coffee crops.  These are all for maintaining and helping the coffee crops and, with these products, she hopes to have a better harvest and excellent results.

Doris' goals for the future are to expand her lands, and plant a variety of grains that will help her business to grow.  She wants to improve her income for the family and, above all, to earn an income to give her children a good education and send them to university.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies for her coffee crops.

loans.name: Salama

texts.en:
Salama, born in 1965, is a retired man who is married and a father of four. One of his sons is in the military, while another is working for a private company. 


Salama has been selling foodstuffs for 10 years, having started his business at home and later opening his own mini market carrying additional products. His enterprise has been sufficiently profitable to help him cover his children's needs. 


Salama is now seeking to add more products to his store such as notebooks, films and general stationary products. To do so, he is requesting this loan.

loans.use: To buy notebooks, films and general stationary products

loans.name: Ilias

texts.en:
Ilyas is a student at the American University of Central Asia (AUCA) and here is his story:

My name is Ilyas. I graduated Kyrgyz-Turkish High School this year and enrolled the American University of Central Asia, because it is one of the best universities in Central Asia and particularly has a very good reputation in our country. I am sure that it will give me a very good opportunity after graduation and all other students who graduate from this university are definitely ready to raise our country to a new, industrial level of development. I have enough knowledge and desire to study at AUCA. I had high grades at school, and above-average results in admission exam. I also took part in the city Russian language Olympiad. 

It is difficult for my family to cover full tuition fees, which caused my application for a financial aid. It is very good opportunity that AUCA gives to its students. KIVA loan will make life easier to all the students that will get a financial support from them.
  
I am aware of AUCA students to be working in big companies of Kyrgyzstan, thereby recommending AUCA as one of the best universities. When I graduate AUCA I definitely find a prestigious job like those successful alumni and have a power to change our country. Now it is the key point in the development of our country, and we need someone who can skillfully manage the finances of Kyrgyzstan. I believe that the American University of Central Asia will give the most necessary knowledge and abilities to become a professional specialist. I will do my best to satisfy you with my achievements also.

loans.use: To pay for higher education.

loans.name: Hoshimjon

texts.ru: Хошимжон целеустремленный мужчина привыкший добиваться всего сам. Ему 43 года он из района Дж.Руми. Хошимжон женат и у него трое детей. Его дети – это его мотивация, ради них он живет и трудится. Он хочет начать животноводческий бизнес и разводить крупнорогатый скот, но начального капитала у него не хватает для осуществления цели. По этой причине он просит кредит. От их прибыли Хошимжон надеется построить дом, так как его старый уже разваливается. Учитывая климат Таджикистана, домам каждый год надо делать ремонт. Но на ремонт у Хошимжона нет денег. А его семье надо, где то жить. Он работает не покладая рук. Надеемся, что у него все получится.
texts.en:
Hoshimjon is a purposeful man accustomed to achieving everything on his own. He is 43 years old and from the region of J. Rumy. Hoshimjon is married and has three children. His children are his motivation, and it is because of them that he lives and works.  

He wants to start a business breeding cattle, but doesn't have enough start-up capital to implement his plan. For this reason, he has applied for a loan. From its profits, Hoshimjon hopes to build a house, since his old house is falling apart. Due to the climate in Tajikistan, he has needed to repair this house every year, but hasn't had the money for it. His family needs a place to live and he works tirelessly. We hope that he will succeed.

loans.use: to buy and resell cattle

loans.name: Abulfaz

texts.en:
Abulfaz is a 53-year-old man, married and the father of 3 kids. He runs a café and serves people with lunch and dinner. He has eight years of experience. He decided to start his own business because his income as a foreman was not stable and was very low. Now he runs his business and serves people with daily meals in his café. 

People in Azerbaijan like to have lunch in national style cafes and eat national food, as well as spend time with friends in the evening drinking tea with homemade jam. Abulfaz's place doesn’t look very attractive, but his food is delicious and that’s why his café is full of people. His older son helps him and cooks in his café. 

His monthly income is 200 AZN and he would like to increase it. For this purpose he applied for a loan of 2000 AZN. He will use this loan to renovate his café. This will be his fifth loan and he has a good client history.

loans.use: to renovate his café
